idea-plugin.name: CAP CDS-Language Support
idea-plugin.description:
Provides basic support while editing your CDS files.

Enjoy your favorite features integrated into your development environment:

Coding assistance:
  • Error & Syntax highlighting
  • Code completion (Soon)
  • Intention actions and Quick fix (Soon)

This plugin comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY.

This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions.

You can find the source code and more details in this repository
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Now supports:
  • Line comments
  • Annotations
    • assert
    • grant
    • restrict
    • cds.on.insert / cds.on.update
improved overall syntax checking to support more cases
